title: Feeling Lonely
zzzContent:
Tomorrow is the "Day Of Bachelor"(11.11).
I have my own girlfriend. But she is in Hubei .so,I am a backelor in fact.
She says that she feels lonely.I feel lonely too.
She want to find a job in Beijing.I am worrying about this.I ask them manager for help,bug she can't help me.I was considering to accept another invitation of a company,which can pay me for 100,000 Yuan per year.If I accept that,We earn the same although she does'nt work.But If I did that,My vocation life met his death.
so,We must wait,wait for a chance.

I was drunk every night these days.Lonely  defeat me.
